```{r}

data_path<-"/home/fgao/Data_single_cell/Cai_Lab/mDuxCA/"

library(Seurat)
library(Matrix)
library(Matrix.utils)

data_cb<-read.csv(paste(data_path, "mDuxCA_all_reps_intron_raw_count.csv", sep=""), header=T, row.names=1)

# aggregate by two factors "rep", "leiden"
data_cb.agg <- aggregate(data_cb[, c(3:ncol(data_cb))], by=list(data_cb$rep, data_cb$leiden), sum)
sample_agg <- t(data_cb.agg[,c(3:ncol(data_cb))])
meta_cb<-data.frame(ID=data_cb.agg$Group.1, CLUSTER=paste("Cluster",data_cb.agg$Group.2, sep=""))
colnames(sample_agg)<-meta_cb$CLUSTER
write.table(t(sample_agg), file=paste(data_path, "ensembl_gene_counts.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t", col.names=F)

library(DESeq2)  
dds1 <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData=sample_agg, colData=meta_cb, design=~CLUSTER)
dds1 <- DESeq(dds1)

res1 <- results(dds1, contrast = c("CLUSTER", "Cluster0", "Cluster1"))
res1 <- res1[order(res1$padj),]
res1_sig = subset(res1, padj<0.05)
write.table(res1, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster0_Cluster1.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")
write.table(res1_sig, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster0_Cluster1_sig.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")

res1 <- results(dds1, contrast = c("CLUSTER", "Cluster0", "Cluster2"))
res1 <- res1[order(res1$padj),]
res1_sig = subset(res1, padj<0.05)
write.table(res1, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster0_Cluster2.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")
write.table(res1_sig, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster0_Cluster2_sig.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")

res1 <- results(dds1, contrast = c("CLUSTER", "Cluster1", "Cluster2"))
res1 <- res1[order(res1$padj),]
res1_sig = subset(res1, padj<0.05)
write.table(res1, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster1_Cluster2.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")
write.table(res1_sig, file = paste(data_path, "deg_deseq2_ensemble_Cluster1_Cluster2_sig.txt", sep=""), quote=F, sep="\t")

# generate noramlized count matrix
dds1 <- estimateSizeFactors(dds1)
normalized_counts <- counts(dds1, normalized=TRUE)
write.table(rbind(t(meta_cb), normalized_counts), file= paste(data_path, "ensembl_gene_counts_normalized.txt", sep=""), sep="\t", quote=F, col.names=F)

```
